channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Trump administration agrees to keep DC police chief in place, but with immigration enforcement order
item.description: The Trump administration has reversed course and agreed to leave the Washington, D.C., police chief in control of the department after a court hearing.

item.title: New Orleans mayor indicted over allegations of trying to hide relationship with bodyguard
Things to know about the indictment against the New Orleans mayor
